properties.address: Crosby Street, Bangor, County Down BT20 5EE
properties.description: A friendly and welcoming space. Come and share a cup of tea or coffee on a Monday morning.
properties.title: Bangor Salvation Army

properties.address: Belfast South Methodist Church at Agape Centre, Belfast, Antrim BT9 6GF
properties.description: A warm meal and friendly space for all ages! The lobby with comfortable seating is open from 5:00 and the meal is served at 6:00. The meal is at no cost, but a voluntary contribution box is availiable.
properties.title: Community Meal at Agape Centre

properties.address: Falls Leisure Centre, County Antrim BT12 4PB
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 15th December 2023** Join us for a Warm Welcome Morning and get active, socialise with others and enjoy a cup of tea or coffee.
properties.title: Falls Leisure Centre

properties.address: Dufferin Memorial Hall, Bangor, County Down BT20 4LE
properties.description: Community Support and Wellbeing from Bangor Parish Church. Everyone Welcome. Open Thursdays 2pm - 4pm and Saturday 10am - 12noon. Coffee drop in, clothing project, food support and friendly welcome. On Sunday's in the Church we have two worship services which all are welcome to attend.
properties.title: Harbour

properties.address: Belfast Indoor Tennis Arena & Ozone Complex, County Antrim BT6 8LT
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 13th December 2023** Join us for a Warm Welcome Morning and get active, socialise with others and enjoy a cup of tea or coffee.
properties.title: Indoor Tennis Centre and Ozone Complex

properties.address: 2 Pembroke Street, Belfast, County Antrim BT12 6NY
properties.description: A relaxed, welcoming space to enjoy a cup of tea or coffee, meet others and feel at home - in The Village. This space is open to all and people are free to come to chat, to read, to work or play some of our board games. (Please note - Thursday Evening is for Men only)
properties.title: Light & Life Coffee

properties.address: Montgomery Road, Belfast, BT6 9HS, Antrim BT6 9HS
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 13th December 2023** Join us for a Warm Welcome Morning and get active, socialise with others and enjoy a cup of tea or coffee.
properties.title: Lisnasharragh Leisure Centre

properties.address: Shankill Leisure Centre, County Antrim BT13 2BD
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 12th December 2023** Join us for a Warm Welcome Morning and get active, socialise with others and enjoy a cup of tea or coffee.
properties.title: Shankill Leisure Centre

properties.description: The Beacon is open to all to come and enjoy free refreshments and a warm environment on a Tuesday morning from 10 am to 12 noon. We have comfortable seating and toys for the children. On a Friday morning we open for men for the Men's cave from 10am to 12 noon.
properties.title: The Beacon

properties.description: A warm, welcoming, seated area with comfy seats and friendly volunteers who offer tea/coffee and snacks as well as conversation and support if desired. On Tuesdays there is homemade soup and rolls. On Wednesdays there are fresh scones.
properties.title: The Hub

properties.description: We provide a warm space for people to come together, with soup, toast and tea and coffee. Our community spaces are open Monday Wednesday and Friday to all. Our church hall 1 Brewery lane is also open Tuesdays for parents and toddlers, and on Sundays at 3pm for a community church service with tea and coffee after
properties.title: The Salvation Army

properties.description: A welcome warm space to drop in for a coffee and chat. Their is space for everyone at the Welcome Table.
properties.title: The Welcome Table - Drop In

properties.description: A large welcome area with an entrance to the side of our main sanctuary. It offers community, company and coffee (or tea) and a light lunch on Tuesdays. Volunteers welcome you and help create a space where you can just be yourself. As a Christian church we offer practical love to everyone who comes.
properties.title: Welcome Centre - City Church Bangor
